column1: MRI snapshot size (256, 128, 1) with weighting in T2 describing the skull of a man of age  of 37 years old, of axial section n°179 from the base of the skull. We observe the following characteristics: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 1182.5684 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 3402.6855 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 1121.9238 mm³ and the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 3414.5508 mm³.
